Jogo bem famosinho, e o que tem de fama, tem de legal.

Começa bem simples, mas logo o desafio vem.

É um jogo curto, mas que vale a pena de ser jogado, principalmente se for comprado em alguma promoção.

Recomendo fortemente que NÃO olhe detonado caso trave em algum momento, pq por não se tratar de um jogo de ação, isso pode tirar MUITO a graça do jogo. Tenta outra vez, para de jogar por um tempo, respira, depois volta com a mente limpa, q vc encontra a solução.

Não tem um fator replay, depois de zerar, meio q não tem mais graça e sentido em jogar pra zerar novamente (afinal, ão puzzles, e vc ja sabe a solução), exceto se for pelas conquistas.

[b][u][h1]A Cynical Review: Portal[/h1][/u][/b]

[b][u]Is There A Plot?:[/u][/b]
You are a test subject imprisoned by the Aperture Science Corporation. As Chell, you must complete a series of test using the esteemed Portal Gun, that increase in difficulty… until you earn your cake. 

[b][u]Is This Even Fun?:[/u][/b]
Portal is a very fun puzzle based game that really shows off Valves fantastic physics & movement engines. The main antagonist is scripted very well & is extremely quotable. 

[b][u]100% Achievements:[/u][/b]
There are 15 Achievements to be earned in Portal. The first 12/15 are not very difficult at all to achieve though it will require two playthroughs of the Main Story. The last 3 Achievements however, are very hard as it requires earning Medals (up to Gold) on all 18 Portal Challenges. For more information, check out my 100% Achievement Guide: Portal on Steam.

[b][u]Is It Worth Buying?:[/u][/b]
Portal is a fantastic game that offers a very unique experience that no other game has been able to replicate. If you enjoy puzzle-based games, then Portal is definitely for you. 

[b]8/10[/b]

Отличная, короткая игра. Которую я прошёл за один день (2:43). Интересные головоломки, после прохождения которых ты чувствуешь эту эйфорию. И всё это я прошёл на одном дыхании. Я не пожалел что купил эту игру.

Portal je za mě nejlepší logická hra vůbec. Dalo by se říct, že je to nejlepší a nejoriginálnější hra své doby.
Hra je velmi zábavná, i když někdy dokáže slušně potrápit. Rozhodně ji musíte aspoň zkusit.

19小时终于白金了。感慨一句，传送门不愧是经典中的经典啊。

一周目玩着玩着，才发现DOTA2的小精灵至宝是致敬这里面的Weighted Companion Cube。

其实很早就有这个游戏，但是直到最近去了广州的核聚变后看了尚在天国EX的速通才领略到魅力，又下下来开始玩。
Головоломка в чистом виде не более.
